fields.infoText:
The document you upload must be:  

* less than 10 megabytes (10MB)  
* in PDF or Excel format

fields.label: If you owe duty
fields.infoText:
## If you owe duty  

If you have a Direct Debit set up for this tax, you don't need to do anything. Your payment will be collected automatically.  

Otherwise, paying electronically is an easy and secure way to pay. Use the details below and make sure you include your registration number on any payment.

Sort code: 20-05-17

Account number: 23372545

Account name: Customs Duty Schemes
Make sure you pay the duty owed or you may face a penalty.

fields.label: If you need to contact us about your return
fields.infoText:
## If you need to contact us about your return  

Call 0300 200 3700 or email [morc.exciseenquiries@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk](morc.exciseenquiries@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk), quoting your registration number.
